objects.description: [Industroyer](https://collaborate.mitre.org/attackics/index.php/Software/S0001)'s OPC module can brute force values and will send out a 0x01 status which for the target systems equates to a 'Primary Variable Out of Limits' misdirecting operators from understanding protective relay status.(Citation: ESET Win32/Industroyer Jun 2017)

external_references.description: Anton Cherepanov, ESET. (2017, June 12). Win32/Industroyer: A new threat for industrial control systems. Retrieved September 15, 2017.
